text: ennāl avarkk mumpuṇṭāyirunnavaruṭe paryavasānaṁ eṅṅaneyāyirunnu enn kāṇān avar bhūmiyil sañcariccu nēākkiyiṭṭillē? avar ivarekkāḷ eṇṇaṁ kūṭiyavaruṁ, śaktikeāṇṭuṁ bhūmiyil viṭṭēccupēāya avaśiṣṭaṅṅaḷ keāṇṭuṁ ēṟṟavuṁ prabalanmārumāyirunnu. enniṭṭuṁ avar nēṭiyeṭuttirunnateānnuṁ avarkk prayēājanappeṭṭilla
